channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
Hey I have been trying to log onto my server for 1 week now....I have been able to log on before. I can log on today on localhost, but I want people to join my game. So when I do my no-ip, it won't let me log it. This is what happens.....it takes like 1 minute then and error message comes up saying "error connecting to server".
This has been happening for all of my sources I tried please help.
It seems as though my source isnt in sync with my no-ip thing but it says that everything is connected fine.

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @jjcoolj2 jjcoolj2
item.description:
@jjcoolj2 wrote:

How can I find that out? Sorry if its a newbie question. Also does any one know how to portforward a verizon action tec router

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Can you ping to your local router interface (such as 192.168.1.254)?

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @jjcoolj2 jjcoolj2
item.description:
@jjcoolj2 wrote:

It is says Reason: No route to host

Read full topic

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Reason: Connection timed out = You didn’t port forward right.

Reason: Connection refused = Nothing to receve a connection.

Your ISP is not blocking port = Working fine.

Read full topic

okay i did it said I could not see your serves?

Test ur ports.
